meta_title: What Does Calibrate Mean? The 2026 Metrology & Maintenance Handbook
meta_description: Inaccurate sensors cost manufacturers millions. Here is the authoritative definition of calibration, NIST traceability, and how Factory AI automates compliance.
title: Calibrate Definition: The Authoritative Guide to Industrial Metrology and AI Integration

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-resolution image inside a modern manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance technicians and engineers (wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests) are gathered around a large industrial pump system. One technician is holding a tablet (back facing the camera) while inspecting a sensor on the machine. In the background, the factory floor is busy but clean, with blurred conveyor belts and automated machinery. The lighting is bright and industrial, highlighting the professionalism and technology integration. No text or overlays in the image. The atmosphere conveys precision, collaboration, and advanced technology.
